content.query:
CREATE TABLE Customer
  (  
    CustomerID	varchar(64),
    LastName	varchar(64),
    FirstName	varchar(64),
    PhoneNumber	varchar(64),
    CreatedDate	Date,
    UpdatedDate	Date,
    SourceID	Integer,
    UniqueID	varchar(64)

  )  
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, CLUSTERED INDEX (CustomerID));
